ingredients.content: 450 g butternut squash, cut in pieces (3 cm)
240 g cooked chickpeas, drained, rinsed (1 x 400 g tin)
250 g pasta, dry, fusilli or penne
1 small handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only, roughly chopped

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place squash, chilli and thyme leaves in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add stock cube, boiling water and chickpeas then cook <b>10 min/98°C//speed <b>.
Add pasta then cook <b>select time indicated on packet/98°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add salt, pepper and reserved grated Parmesan then stir <b>1 min//speed 0.5<b>. Finish stirring by hand with spatula then serve garnished with chopped fresh parsley.
